titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

body.ab:
1941 DIEBOLD Mlle Jeanine 13 rue du Palais Auxerre (Yonne)
3 mos 2 vols S 70 can take 4 vols dep 200
Feb 26 Shropshire of Mary Webb March 29 Mary Webb her life & work, Moult March 29 Good Earth March 29 Three Loves March 29 March 29 Precious Bane April 26 29 Passage to India bought (penguin ed) ap 26 29 Death Comes for the Archbishop April 26 29 Daphne Adeane April 26 29 Three Marriages April 26 April 26 Goodbye Mr Chipps May 10 26 Jasmine Farm May 24 26 Thank Heaven Fasting May 24 26 Curse of the Wise Woman May 10 May 10 Far from the Madding Crowd May 24 10 Tess of the D'Urbervilles May 24 24 Garden Party June 21 24 Dr Bradley Remembers June 21 24 World Brain June 21 24 Woman in the Hall discovered copy in library Farm (renewed June 2) Dec 4 1941 Renewed May 26 - August 26 1941 2 vols S 70 pd May 24 1941
to Sept 26 1941 June 21 Shropshire Lad 2 V. July 19 21 Patriot Last Poems July 19 Farm July 19 Caravan Sept 5 Altogether Sept 5 Sept 5 One of Ours 17 Janr. 5 I'll Never be Young Again 17 ____ 5 Exile wrote Oct 10 to ask to return it for Devel Oct 16 Renewed Sept 26 - December 26 3m 2 vols S 70 pd Oct 9 Oct 9 Farewell to Arms xx ? (the Farm still out?) see May 24 SB wrote Oct 16 Turned up Dec 4 on shelf
